text: Analysis of the normalized codon scores ( NCS ) clearly shows that codon preference degenerated continuously throughout the entire history of the human H1N1 line ( Figure 6 ) . All viruses in our database are more duck - like in their codon usage and most ( 99 . 8 % ) are more human - like than pig - like , but codon preference moved toward randomized codon use and away from the codon preference of the human , swine and duck hosts .
